pages.text: Dangshi, zhenzhu yu ceng shou tian jing de ren diyue, shuo: Nimen bi wei shiren chanming tian jing, nimen buke yinhui ta. Dan tamen ba ta pao zai beihou, bing yi ta huanqu xiewei de daijia. Tamen suo huanqu de zhen elie!
Youxie ren duiyu ziji zuoguo de shi, yangyang deyi; duiyu ziji weiceng zuoguo de shi, ai shou zansong, ni jue buyao renwei tamen jiang tuoli xingfa, qishi, tamen jiang shou tongku de xingfa.
Tiandi de guo quan guizhenzhu suoyou. Zhenzhu duiyu wanshi shi quanneng de.
Tiandi de chuangzao, zhouye de lunliu, zai you lizhi de ren kan lai, ci zhong que you xuduo jixiang.

Tamen zhanzhe, zuozhe, tangzhe jinian zhen zhu, bing siwei tiandi de chuangzao,(tamen shuo): Women de zhu a! Ni meiyou turan di chuangzao zhege shijie. Women zansong ni chaojue wanwu, qiu ni baohu women, mian shou huo yu de xingfa.
Women de zhu a! Ni shi shei ru huo yu, ni que yi lingru sheile. Bu yi de ren, jue meiyou yuanzhu zhe.

Women de zhu a! Women que yi tingjianle yige zhaohuan de ren, zhao ren yu zhengxin,(ta shuo):'Nimen dang quexin nimen de zhu.'Women jiu quexinle. Women de zhu a! Qiu ni she you women de zui'e, qiu ni xiaochu women de guoshi, qiu ni shi women yu yi renmen si zai yi chu.
Women de zhu a! Ni ceng jie zhong shizhe de kou er yingxu women de enhui, qiu ni ba ta shangci women, qiu ni zai fuhuo ri buyao lingru women. Ni que shi bu shuangyue de.
